mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id,name,pwd,create_time,update_time,createdatetime,modifydatetime) values(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createdatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifydatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update t_user set
name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd=#{pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time=#{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time=#{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createdatetime=#{createdatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifydatetime=#{modifydatetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select ID, CREATEDATETIME, MODIFYDATETIME, NAME, PWD from t_user
and name like concat(concat('%', #{object.name}),'%')
order by
#{item}
